body_html:
Yeah, that's one of the issues with tensor flow we heard about. I've heard the you can configure tensor flow not to do that but that. IIUC you need to do that when you create a session:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34199233/how-to-prevent-tensorflow-from-allocating-the-totality-of-a-gpu-memory

body:
Yeah, that's one of the issues with tensor flow we heard about. I've heard the you can configure tensor flow not to do that but that. IIUC you need to do that when you create a session:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34199233/how-to-prevent-tensorflow-from-allocating-the-totality-of-a-gpu-memory
